channel.title: Black Mesa Source: Strange A.I. and Inventory Glitch/Bug
channel.description:
Okay, Here we go...
So I was bored one day and I wanted to play Black Mesa Source...You don't know what Black Mesa is...get out of here......but if you do know what I'm talking about, this is what happened...
As I was saying, I launched Black Mesa and loaded up my latest save file. (It was at the bit where a tank is trying to shoot you and your standing next to a car repair station.) I look at the right side of my screen and I see some text saying A.I. Disabled and what do you know THE A.I. IS DISABLED!!!
Before you reply: I have typed ai_disable 0 I have typed ai_resume I have re-launched the game about 2.6 billion times.
It would be great if you could help.
Thanks a lot.

item.title: Black Mesa Source: Strange A.I. and Inventory Glitch/Bug
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
Try Sersoft’s solution first.

sersoft:

sv_cheats 1
(sv_)maxplayers 1

then ai_disable

If that doesn’t work, I would recommend uninstalling and reinstalling Black Mesa. Before you do that though, backup your saves and your gamestate.txt file (achievement data).
